subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer outlasted Jay Haas, the defending champion, in the Toshiba Classic, birdieing the final hole of regulation to force a playoff and winning with a birdie on the seventh extra hole of the Champions Tour event in Newport Beach, Calif. After bogeying the par-3 17th to drop a stroke behind, Langer birdied the par-5 18th to force the playoff at 14-under 199.
snippet: Bernhard Langer outlasted Jay Haas, the defending champion, in the Toshiba Classic, birdieing the final hole of regulation to force a playoff and winning with a birdie on the seventh extra hole of the Champions Tour event in Newport Beach, Calif....
